name: Hydra
lore: A hydra is a reptilian horror with a crocodilian body and multiple heads on long, serpentine necks. It lurks in swamps, along lakeshores, and in coastal shallows. When one of its heads is destroyed, two more grow from the stump unless the wound is cauterized with fire.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.description: The hydra can hold its breath for 1 hour.

traits.name: Multiple Heads
traits.description: The hydra has five heads. Whenever the hydra takes 25 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the hydra dies. At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken Fire damage since its last turn. The hydra regains 10 Hit Points for each head regrown in this way.

traits.name: Reactive Heads
traits.description: For each head the hydra has beyond one, it gets an extra Reaction that can be used only for Opportunity Attacks.

traits.name: Wakeful
traits.description: While the hydra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

multiattack.description: The hydra makes a number of Bite attacks equal to the number of heads it has.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 10 ft. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) Piercing damage.
